subsection.name: Attribute Tag
subsection.p: An attribute may be declared within an interface or class. When declared under an interface the attribute will be included in the generated service defintion. When declared under a class, the attribute will be included in the info element of the type defintion.
Generated meta-info when declared within an interface:
subsection.source: <service> <attributes> <attribute name="description" value="an example"/> <attribute name="color" value="red"/> <attribute name="priority" value="normal"/> </attributes> </service>
subsection.p: Generated meta-info when declared within an class:
subsection.source: <type> <info> <attributes> <attribute name="description" value="an example"/> <attribute name="color" value="red"/> <attribute name="priority" value="normal"/> </attributes> </info> </type>
